name: Patch Component State
description: Update component props without remounting (smooth, flicker-free updates). This is a streaming UI tool that dynamically patches props of already-mounted interactive components. Supports merge/replace modes for full props, incremental array operations (add/remove/update items), batch operations, and animated transitions. Use this for real-time data updates, progressive loading, status changes, and refined updates with visual feedback. Component must already be mounted via render_manifest.

moduleId.description: ID of the interactive module to update (must match existing module ID from render_manifest)

propsPatch.description: Partial props to merge with or replace existing props (required for merge/replace modes)

mode.description: Operation mode: 'merge' (default) merges propsPatch, 'replace' replaces all props, 'array_add' adds items to array, 'array_remove' removes items by ID, 'array_update' updates specific items, 'batch' executes multiple operations

animate.description: Enable smooth animated transition for prop changes (default: true)

animation.description: Custom animation configuration for visual feedback

color.description: Color for flash/highlight animations (CSS color value)

path.description: Dot notation path to array property (required for array operations, e.g., 'data.rows')

items.description: Items to add to array (required for array_add mode)

position.description: Position to add items in array (default: 'end')

itemIds.description: Array of item IDs to remove (required for array_remove mode)

idField.description: Field name to use as unique identifier for array items (default: 'id')

updates.description: Array of update objects with id and changes (required for array_update mode)

changes.description: Properties to update on the item

operations.description: Array of operations to execute in sequence (required for batch mode)
